text:
"You are Balhazar," you announce as you approach the man. He turns with a half smile, then fades away into thin air. You look around to see all the other guests disappearing as well. Only one remains, a man in a domino cape. When he stands up you recognise the imposing height and imperious stance of Magus Balhazar.

"You have failed my test," says Balhazar as he unmasks. "Regrettable, as I had hoped you would do better. Now, it is time for you to leave."
